workshoptitle: Lock up risk with Oracle Data Safe

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab provides information about the workshop.

tutorials.title: Prepare Your Environment
tutorials.description: Prerequisites to run the workshop in your own tenancy.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Register an Autonomous Database with Oracle Data Safe
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to register an Autonomous Data Warehouse on Shared Exadata Infrastructure with Oracle Data Safe and load sample data into it.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Assess Database Configurations
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to assess database configurations in your Autonomous Database by using the Security Assessment feature in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Assess Database Users
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to assess database users in your Autonomous Database by using the User Assessment feature in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Discover Sensitive Data
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to discover sensitive data on your target database by using the Data Discovery feature in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Mask Sensitive Data
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to mask sensitive data on your target database by using the Data Masking feature in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 6 (Optional): Audit Database Activity
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to provision audit policies in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 7 (Optional): Generate Alerts
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to provision alert policies in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
